 You are here Home  /  Research Services  /  Finding and Evaluating Information  /  Subject Guides 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Subject Guides 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The library offers many subject guides prepared by library staff. The guides are updated periodically with resources for specific subject areas. Subject guides may include: • Where to find books and articles 
 • Databases 
 • Journals 
 • Quick reference resources 
 • Specialized resources 
 • Tools and tutorials 
 • Related information 
 • Library contacts
